Class CMLTransform3

java.lang.Object
  nu.xom.Node

All Implemented Interfaces:
CMLConstants, EuclidConstants
public class CMLTransform3
extends AbstractTransform3

user-modifiable class supporting transform3. * autogenerated from schema use as a shell which can be edited

concatenate

public CMLTransform3 concatenate(CMLTransform3 m2)
concatenate. (I think this is right...) result = this * m2 i.e. if x' = m2 * x and x'' = this * x'' then x'' = result * x;

Parameters:
m2 - transform to be concatenated
Returns:
result of applying this to m2

hasNonZeroTranslationComponent

public boolean hasNonZeroTranslationComponent()
does operator have a translation component. true if any operator is of form a+xyz where a is non-zero and xyz is x, y, z this should extract screw axis, glide and centering operations. at present probably only useful for orthorhombic and below

Returns:
true if has component.

isPureTranslation

public boolean isPureTranslation()
does operator have only translation components. true if operators are of form a+x, b+y, c+z where at least one of a, b, c is non-zero this should extract centering operations.

Returns:
true if has component.

isUnit

public boolean isUnit()
true if transform is unit matrix.

Returns:
true if unit matrix

public void normalizeCrystallographically()
adjusts translation to be inside unit cell. range is 0 (inclusive) to 1 (exclusive)
